input.sentences: when i was little | i lived next to the water .
i lived in an apartment building with 5 stories .
i used to wake up every day and admire the statue out front .
it was built to honor world war ii .
every day before bed | i would pray in the community chapel next to my building .
output.sentences: Younger, I lived on the water with my parents boat
I used to hear strange stories about people that lived in building
When I wake up, there was always a statue in front of our boat
It was a soldier from the World War ii
To honor his memory, we pray every day in our community for him
